title: How to work better
content:
Hi.. I’ve got two fonts, from which I would like to know a bit more, if someone can help me out with that.

- one is from an artwork by Fischli/Weiss called “How To Work Better”  
- the other one – subscribe – I found as a headline in the Tate mag.

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180902im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/subscribe_4278.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180902im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/how_5090.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Keymark logo square type - Serpentine {Pieter van Rosmalen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180902/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28941 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) elusive "airabia.com" logo humanist sans - Myriad {Raph} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180902/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28914 "Go to next forum topic")
author: I am not

comments.content:
’Subscribe’ seems like an attempt to re-create Prisma, which has been discussed here recently.

The other lettering looks like something created from a scan from a printer’s letterforms. This suggests ’freebie’ font somewhere.

- Mike Yanega

Prisma as a freedownload [here, scroll down a bit](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180902/http:/moorstation.org/Koch_Memorial/dl/dl_02.htm).  
Check out Zeppelin on the same page …
